description: Malaysia PM Muhyiddin can now capitalise on the convictionsÂ to secure a stronger mandate, says Malaysia bureau chief Shannon Teoh. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: 1MDB graft convictions put ex-Malaysia PM Najib out of the running if snap polls are called
title_page: 1MDB graft convictions put ex-Malaysia PM Najib out of the running if snap polls are called | The Straits Times
maintext:
KUALA LUMPUR - One thing's for certain now - Najib Razak will not return as Malaysia's leader should a snap poll is called.
As ridiculous as it may seem, before his conviction for graft on Tuesday (July 28), Najib was still a dark horse bet for his old job despite leading his Barisan Nasional coalition to a shock 2018 election defeat that was partly fuelled by his role in the billion-dollar 1MDB scandal.
